answers.answer: Hello,The diarrhea could be a side effect from the Metformin, which is quite common. Alternatively, it could be a viral illness, which would also explain your higher glucose numbers. If it continues past a week, I suggest speaking to your doctor about possible side effects form the medication, or work-up of GI illnesses that are sometimes more common in people with diabetes. In the meantime try to stay hydrated and stay with bland foods.Take care.
You might consider stopping the aloe. It has no health benefits taken orally, and can definitely cause diarrhea (aloe used to be used as an ingredient in laxatives).
